question.S: How do I reset my password?

answer.S: To reset your password, go to https://example.com/reset and follow the steps. If you have MFA enabled, use your authenticator app.

If you’re unable to access your email, please check your internet connection and ensure you’re using the correct login credentials. If the issue continues, please contact the IT support team at it-support@example.com.
Please restart your home router and check if other devices are connected to your network. If issue persists, contact your ISP.
Please check your office Wi-Fi connection and ensure you’re connected to the correct SSID. If the issue continues, contact IT support.
